properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 1 at 2:14PM MST until February 4 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 14
inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph above 10,000 feet.

* WHERE...Eastern Uinta Mountains.

* WHEN...From 11 PM Sunday to 10 AM MST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow
will significantly reduce visibility especially along Route 191.
A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at:
www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM SUNDAY TO 10 AM MST TUESDAY
